description: Charfield is a pretty Gloucestershire village located just to the east of Kingswood and Wotton-under-Edge. See the maps and links below for walking ideas around the village.
display_address: Longs View, Charfield, South Gloucestershire, West of England, England, GL12 8SN, United Kingdom
